batchMiscs.name: NL Spa Reine Flat Mineral Water

notes.note: Split off 1.2 L wort from Batch #41.

batchFermentables.usedIn: Wheat beers and adjunct for ales up to 40%of grist.
batchFermentables.name: Wheat Malt

batchHops.name: Cascade (T90)
batchHops.notes: Unique very floral/spicy aroma with good bittering quality. Cascade has a unique floral/spicy aroma both in the cone form and in the beer, mainly due to abnormal levels of some of the essential oils. It is very popular with some brewers due to the unique character imparted to the finished beer, it has a“perfume like” hoppy flavour. Trial brews and tastings also show a superior bitterness quality with Cascade even at high EBU levels (40+) there is little harshness or lingering bitterness.

recipe.author: The Thirsty Otter

Cascade has a unique floral/spicy aroma both in the cone form and in the beer,mainly due to abnormal levels of some of the essential oils. It is very popular with some brewers due to the unique character imparted to the finished beer, it has a“perfume like” hoppy flavour. yeasts.name: SafAle English Ale
yeasts.description: English ale yeast selected for its fast fermentation character and its ability to form a compact sediment at the end of fermentation, helping to improve beer clarity. Recommended for the production of a large range of ales and specially adapted to cask-conditioned ones and fermentation in cylindo-conical tanks.

recipe.notes: Add aroma hops and cool over night.
